recipes.title: Breakfast Burrito
recipes.description: A flour tortilla containing bacon or sausage, potatoes, eggs, veggies, and salsa.

recipes.title: Veggie Fiesta Burrito
recipes.description: A quick and healthy vegetarian seasoned rice, black beans, tomatoes, guacamole, and three-cheese blend.

recipes.title: Wet Burrito
recipes.description: This burrito has shredded meat, beans, and baked with cheese on top.

recipes.title: Poncho Veggie Burrito
recipes.description: A comforting vegetarian stewed or refried beans, salsa, chile, and cheese wrapped in a tortilla.

recipes.title: Chicken Tortilla Soup
recipes.description: Chicken tortilla soup is like a taco in soup form with chunky veggies and shredded chicken.

recipes.title: California Burrito
recipes.description: A taste of California! Cheese, beef, chicken, and blazing hot chillis!

recipes.title: Chimichanga
recipes.description: Spice lovers we have you covered! Chicken & beef and blazing hot jalapeno peppers!

recipes.title: Chocolate Cookies
recipes.description: Tasty vegetarian chocolate chip cookies that are soft and gooey inside.

recipes.title: Veggie Tacos
recipes.description: Homemade vegetarian tacos with seasoned plant-based vegetables and fresh toppings.
